title: MD
biography: Avram Hershko is a Hungarian-born Israeli biochemist who received the Nobel Prize in Chemistry in 2004.
aiSummary: Avram Hershko is a biochemistry specialist with an H-index of 67 at Technion (Member). Has been published in Nature Cell Biology, Molecular Biology of the Cell, Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
